text: The 2019–20 season was Real Club Celta de Vigo's 92nd season in existence and the club's 8th consecutive season in the top flight of Spanish football. In addition to the domestic league, Celta Vigo participated in this season's edition of the Copa del Rey. The season was slated to cover a period from 1 July 2019 to 30 June 2020. It was extended extraordinarily beyond 30 June due to the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain. ==Players== ===Current squad=== ===Reserve team=== ===Out on loan=== ==Transfers== === In === {| class="wikitable"
